data.actual_result: It’ll change my messages time to my phone time, but everyone else’s time will be of my time zone. My messages also won’t combine.
data.expected_result: It’ll all either stay with my time zone, or will move with my phone clock time
data.short_description: Change of time without change of time zone will result in your time being mixed up with the time zones time, and your messages don’t combine until later.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to setting, General, date/time - Go and turn off “Set automatically” - Stay in your time zone, and change the time an hour forward
